code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{CartContext}from'./CartContext';import'./navbar.css';import{FaCartShopping}from'react-icons/fa6';import nikelogo from'../assets/niki.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{cartItems,hasViewedCart,resetCartView}=useContext(CartContext);const handleNavigation=path=>{if(path==='/cart'){resetCartView();}navigate(path);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo-container",onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:nikelogo,alt:"Logo",className:"navbar-logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"center-nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/men'),children:"Men"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/women'),children:"Women"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/kids'),children:"Kids"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-icon-container",onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/cart'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCartShopping,{className:"cart-icon"}),!hasViewedCart&&cartItems.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cart-count",children:cartItems.length})]})]});};export default Navbar;
